subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bud Selig, baseball’s commissioner, has cited the “best interests of baseball” clause to lenders to the Rangers in an effort to get them to accept a bid they say is below market value.
snippet: Bud Selig, baseball’s commissioner, has cited the “best interests of baseball” clause to lenders to the Rangers in an effort to get them to accept a bid they say is below market value.
